DOC.brief_summary: Primary purpose is to assess if IMA-638 is safe and improves asthma in subjects with persistent asthma.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Effect of IMA-638 in Subjects With Persistent Asthma
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy men and women with persistent asthma, 18 to 70 years of age, with body weight between 50 kg and 115 kg. History of treatment with a medium to high dose of inhaled corticosteroids (ICS), with or without longacting betaagonists (LABA), for at least 2 months prior to the screening visit and must remain constant during the study. FEV1 ≥ 55% to ≤ 80% predicted and demonstrated improvement in FEV1 (L) with inhaled albuterol (salbutamol) (reversibility) of ≥ 12%.
